member.name: ID2D1Device2.CreateDeviceContext
member.summary: Creates a new from a Direct2D device.
member.param: The options to be applied to the created device context.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to the new device context.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1Device2.FlushDeviceContexts
member.summary: Flush all device contexts that reference a given bitmap.
member.param: The bitmap, created on this device, for which all referencing device contexts will be flushed.

member.name: ID2D1Device2.GetDxgiDevice
member.summary: Returns the DXGI device associated with this Direct2D device.
member.param: The DXGI device associated with this Direct2D device.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1Device2
member.summary: Represents a resource domain whose objects and device contexts can be used together. This interface performs all the same functions as the existing interface. It also enables the creation of objects.
